text: Marvin Marvin is an American comedy science fiction television series. It aired on Nickelodeon from November 24, 2012, to April 27, 2013. It stars Lucas Cruikshank of Fred fame as the titular character Marvin Forman, an alien teenage boy adjusting to human life. The series ended after one season due to Lucas' contract with Nickelodeon expiring. Set in Portland, Oregon, it follows the adventures of a teenage alien with special powers named Marvin who was sent to Earth by his parents in order to protect him from evil invaders on his home planet, Klooton. title: Marvin Marvin
